law.catch_line: Availability of Absentee Ballots for Presidential Elections.

text.section:
Sec. 12-14.2. Availability of Absentee Ballots for Presidential Elections.
To the extent otherwise permitted by and consistent with the requirements Florida law, the Miami-Dade County Supervisor of Elections shall afford registered electors the opportunity to pick up and return absentee ballots on the Sunday and Monday immediately preceding the Election Day of a Presidential Election for any day during which Early Voting is not offered by the Supervisor of Elections. The Supervisor of Elections shall designate locations in Miami-Dade County for electors to pick up or return absentee ballots and shall establish the hours available for such purpose.
